carpet.rule.cheatDetector.desc: Detects not allowed client mod feature specified in the config file.
carpet.rule.disableSoundEngine.desc: Disables server-side sound engine to optimize
carpet.rule.endGatewayChunkLoad.desc: When an entity passes through end gateway portal it will loaded 3x3 chunk like a nether portal
carpet.rule.endPortalChunkLoad.desc: When an entity passes through end portal it will loaded 3x3 chunk like a nether portal
carpet.rule.hopperLock.desc: Locks all of the hoppers in the world
carpet.rule.notifyLitematicShared.desc: Sends a notification to the chat when a player shared a syncmatic.
carpet.rule.reloadPortalTicket.desc: Reloads chunk loading tickets by nether portal on server restarts. Improves chunk loader reliability.
carpet.rule.requireAmaCarpetClient.desc: Requires AmaCarpet installed Client to join the server.(Reject all players to login without AmaCarpet).
carpet.rule.requireAmaCarpetClientTimeOu: Timeout duration for checking if the client has AmaCarpet.
